docs.text: Disclaimer These analyses and visualizations do not reflect any official views. The results are subject to data cleaning, ingesting, processing, and algorithmic and computational analysis issues due to resource limitations. There may also be some errors (we have cleaned them up to our knowledge) due to pdf conversion. The analyses have been done in good faith in a spirit of free inquiry. We do not recommend that content from this website be cited as independently reviewed research. Any suggested corrections are welcome.
